      java.util.List<Chain> findAllChains()
      Returns a list of all chain setup in db
      ChainLink findChainLinkByClassName(java.lang.String fullyQualifiedClassName)
      Searches a chain link code object based on its fully qualified class name
      java.util.List<ChainLink> findChainLinksByKeyword(java.lang.String keyword)
      Finds a list of chain links which properties (title, usage, class name) contains the given keyword Used on the UI to search for specific chain links by it code class name This is a heavy method use it carefully because it needs to compile and instanciate all configured chain links to be able to search on its title, description, etc
      java.util.List<ChainState> getChainStates(Chain chain)
      Retrieve a list of states associated to a chain in the order they are setup on the chain
      ChainLink instanciateChainLink(long linkCodeId)
      This method as the logic to instantiate a chain link class taking the code from the db, compiling it and giving to you an instance of it, if the code is already compiled and the implementation hasn't change in db, it will take it from disk and not re-compile.
      Chain loadChain(long chainId)
      Look for a chain object based on it's id, returns null if doesn't find it
      Chain loadChainByKey(java.lang.String chainKey)
      Retrieves a chain by its given key
      java.util.List<ChainStateParameter> loadChainStateParameters(ChainState chainState)
      Retrieves all the parameters associated to the given state
      void saveChain(Chain chain, java.util.List<ChainState> states)
      Save a chain with all it states configuration, it makes sure that all the state have correct order set if not it tries to reorganize them based on the order of the given list
      ChainLink saveChainLink(long chainLinkId, java.lang.String className, java.lang.String code, ChainLinkCode.Language lang)
      Updates the code on a chain link

      • instanciateChainLink

        public ChainLink instanciateChainLink(long linkCodeId)
                               throws DotRuntimeException,
                                      DotDataException,
                                      DotCacheException
        Description copied from interface: ChainAPI
        This method as the logic to instantiate a chain link class taking the code from the db, compiling it and giving to you an instance of it, if the code is already compiled and the implementation hasn't change in db, it will take it from disk and not re-compile.
        Specified by:
        instanciateChainLink in interface ChainAPI
        Returns:
        Throws:

        Description copied from interface: ChainAPI
        Finds a list of chain links which properties (title, usage, class name) contains the given keyword Used on the UI to search for specific chain links by it code class name This is a heavy method use it carefully because it needs to compile and instanciate all configured chain links to be able to search on its title, description, etc

      • saveChainLink

        public ChainLink saveChainLink(long chainLinkId,
                      java.lang.String className,
                      java.lang.String code,
                      ChainLinkCode.Language lang)
                        throws DuplicatedChainLinkException,
                               ChainLinkCodeCompilationException,
                               DotDataException,
                               DotRuntimeException,
                               DotCacheException
        Description copied from interface: ChainAPI
        Updates the code on a chain link
        Specified by:
        saveChainLink in interface ChainAPI
        Parameters:
        chainLinkId - the id of the chain link to update if 0 is passed then it will create a new chain link
        className - The class name to instantiate in the passed code
        code - The code to compile
        lang - The language of the passed code
        Returns:
        The instantiated chain link
        Throws:
        ChainLinkCodeCompilationException
        DotDataException
        DotRuntimeException
        DotCacheException
        DuplicatedChainLinkException
